resources.string: Please note: more rows and columns may have an impact on performance.
Designed and created by Robert Taylor, i7437871 - Utilizing NetwalkGrid.java by Dr Paul De Vrieze.
You finished the game in X taps. Why not try a harder difficulty, or maybe a custom game?

The idea of Netwalk is simple - you must connect each computer to the server. To achieve this you must rotate cables, computers and the server into their correct positions by tapping on them. Go careful though, there\'s a 1 in 100 chance that your grid will be randomly scrambled!
From left to right: Computer, Server and Cable.
